name: Squire
bio: Squire started this website to give the power back to the people. He enjoys watching people do things. He hates blue people. Lives in New York.

name: Overripebug
bio: Overripebug currently works at a startup. Previously graduated with a math degree from Williams College. Enjoys gefilte fish in his free time.

name: Alejandro Armstrong
bio: Alejandro is a student at Columbia University.
